title: Yaavum Poithaanaa Lyrics Aadhi Bhagavan Songs Lyrics
stanzas:
Song: Yaavum Poithaanaa
Singers: Madhushree
Movie: Aadhi Bhagavan
Music: Yuvan
Lyrics : Snehan

Yaavum Poithaana ? kadhal thavira manmeley
nee en uyir thaana ? naanum pilaithaen unnaaley
kadhal unnodu karuvaanadhey
katril isai pola pariponadhey
idhuvarai idhu illai, edhuvarai idhan ellai
enakoru padhil solvaayadaa

unnkkaana mounathil enakaana varthayai
naan thaedi paarthathil
sugam kandaen kandaen naanthaanada

Puviengum idhayangal vazhkindra poadhilum
enakaana idhyamayaai unnai kandaen kandaen
naanthaanada

Yaavum Poithaana ? kadhal thavira manmeley
nee en uyir thaana ? naanum pilaithaen unnaaley

undhan urave podhum enaku anbae
undhan anaipal muchai niruthu anbae

konjam mayakkam konjam thayakkam 
rendum kadhal thandha parisuthaan

konjam nerukkam konjam irakkam
rendum penmai ketkum parisuthaan

Aasi anaithum unnai nokiye poga
osai indriye vaarthai anaithum saaga

Thoongum vizhigalil thooral vilundhadhaal
thooram kuraigayil unnarkiren

Endha nadaigalil ada thiraigalai
vittu vilaginaan malargiren

unnkkaana mounathil enakaana varthayai
naan thaedi paarthathil
sugam kandaen kandaen naanthaanada

Puviengum idhayangal vazhkindra poadhilum
enakaana idhyamayaai unnai kandaen kandaen
naanthaanada
